mean_cn: n. 叛教者，脱党者，叛徒；  v. 背叛，背教，变节；  adj. 叛教的，背叛的，变节的
mean_en: a person who leaves one group, religion, etc., and joins another that opposes it
sentence: He is a renegade who betrayed us by joining the Japanese military.
sentence_trans: 他是个叛徒，背叛我们加入了日军。
word_etyma: re向后，相反 ＋ neg否认 ＋ ade名词后缀，表示人 → renegade背叛者
